batch_narrative: cisa_kev: 200 advisories (200 critical) 200 actively exploited 48 with ransomware use.

flagged.headline: Zyxel Multiple Products Use of Hard-Coded Credentials Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Zyxel firewalls (ATP, USG, VM) and AP Controllers (NXC2500 and NXC5500) contain a use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability in an undocumented account ("zyfwp") with an unchangeable password.

flagged.headline: Zoho ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus (SDP) File Upload Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Zoho ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus (SDP) contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows remote users to upload files via login page customization.

flagged.headline: Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central File Upload Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central contains a file upload vulnerability that allows for unauthenticated remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus contains an authentication bypass vulnerability affecting the REST API URLs which allow for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Yealink Device Management Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Yealink Device Management contains a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability that allows for unauthenticated remote code execution.

flagged.headline: WordPress Social Warfare Plugin Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: WordPress Social Warfare plugin contains a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that allows for remote code execution. This vulnerability affects Social Warfare and Social Warfare Pro.

flagged.headline: WordPress Snap Creek Duplicator Plugin File Download Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: WordPress Snap Creek Duplicator plugin contains a file download vulnerability when an administrator creates a new copy of their site that allows an attacker to download the generated files from their Wordpress dashboard. This vulnerability affects Duplicator and Dulplicator Pro.

flagged.headline: WordPress File Manager Plugin Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: WordPress File Manager plugin contains a remote code execution vulnerability that allows unauthenticated users to execute PHP code and upload malicious files on a target site.

flagged.headline: Multiple VMware Products Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware Workspace One Access, Access Connector, Identity Manager, and Identity Manager Connector contain a command injection vulnerability. An attacker with network access to the administrative configurator on port 8443 and a valid password for the configurator administrator account can execute commands with unrestricted privileges on the underlying operating system.

flagged.headline: VMware vCenter Server Improper Input Validation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware vSphere Client contains an improper input validation vulnerability in the Virtual SAN Health Check plug-in, which is enabled by default in vCenter Server, which allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: VMware vCenter Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware vCenter Server vSphere Client contains a remote code execution vulnerability in a vCenter Server plugin which allows an attacker with network access to port 443 to execute commands with unrestricted privileges on the underlying operating system.

flagged.headline: VMware vCenter Server Information Disclosure Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware vCenter Server contains an information disclosure vulnerability in the VMware Directory Service (vmdir) when the Platform Services Controller (PSC) does not correctly implement access controls. Successful exploitation allows an attacker with network access to port 389 to extract sensitive information.

flagged.headline: VMware vCenter Server File Upload Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware vCenter Server contains a file upload vulnerability in the Analytics service that allows a user with network access to port 443 to execute code.

flagged.headline: VMware Multiple Products Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware Fusion, Remote Console (VMRC) for Mac, and Horizon Client for Mac contain a privilege escalation vulnerability due to improper use of setuid binaries that allows attackers to escalate privileges to root.

flagged.headline: VMware ESXi OpenSLP Use-After-Free Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware ESXi OpenSLP contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows an attacker residing in the management network with access to port 427 to perform remote code execution.

flagged.headline: VMware ESXi and Horizon DaaS OpenSLP Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: VMware ESXi and Horizon Desktop as a Service (DaaS) OpenSLP contains a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability that allows an attacker with network access to port 427 to overwrite the heap of the OpenSLP service to perform remote code execution.

severity.affected_product: VMware VMware ESXi and Horizon DaaS

flagged.headline: vBulletin PHP Module Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: The PHP module within vBulletin contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution via crafted subWidgets data in an ajax/render/widget_tabbedcontainer_tab_panel request. This CVE ID resolves an incomplete patch for CVE-2019-16759.

flagged.headline: vBulletin PHP Module Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: The PHP module within vBulletin contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution via the widgetConfig[code] parameter in an ajax/render/widget_php routestring request.

flagged.headline: Unraid Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Unraid contains a vulnerability due to the insecure use of the extract PHP function that can be abused to execute remote code as root. This CVE is chainable with CVE-2020-5849 for initial access.

flagged.headline: Unraid Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Unraid contains an authentication bypass vulnerability that allows attackers to gain access to the administrative interface. This CVE is chainable with CVE-2020-5847 for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: TVT NVMS-1000 Directory Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: TVT devices utilizing NVMS-1000 software contain a directory traversal vulnerability via GET /.. requests.

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Multiple Products Improper Input Validation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, and Worry-Free Business Security contain an improper input validation vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to upload files.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, and Worry-Free Business Security

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Multiple Products Improper Input Validation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, and Worry-Free Business Security contain an improper input validation vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, and Worry-Free Business Security

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan server contain a vulnerable EXE file that could allow a remote attacker to write data to a path on affected installations and bypass root login.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Multiple Products Improper Access Control Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One, OfficeScan, and Worry-Free Business Security on Microsoft Windows contain an improper access control vulnerability that may allow an attacker to manipulate a particular product folder to disable the security temporarily, abuse a specific Windows function, and attain privilege escalation.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One, OfficeScan, and Worry-Free Business Security

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Multiple Products Content Validation Escape Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One, OfficeScan, and Worry-Free Business Security agents contain a content validation escape vulnerability that could allow an attacker to manipulate certain agent client components.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One, OfficeScan and Worry-Free Business Security Agents

flagged.headline: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan contain an unspecified vulnerability within a migration tool component that allows for remote code execution.

severity.affected_product: Trend Micro Apex One and OfficeScan

flagged.headline: Trend Micro OfficeScan Directory Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Trend Micro OfficeScan contains a directory traversal vulnerability by extracting files from a zip file to a specific folder on the OfficeScan server, leading to remote code execution.

flagged.headline: ThinkPHP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: ThinkPHP contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution via public//?s=index/\think\app/invokefunction&function=call_user_func_array&vars[0]=system&vars[1][]= followed by the command.

flagged.headline: ThinkPHP "noneCms" Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: ThinkPHP "noneCms" contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution through crafted use of the filter parameter.

flagged.headline: Tenda AC7, AC9, and AC10 Routers Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Tenda AC7, AC9, and AC10 devices contain a command injection vulnerability due to the "formsetUsbUnload" function executes a dosystemCmd function with untrusted input. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute OS commands via a crafted goform/setUsbUnload request.

severity.affected_product: Tenda AC7, AC9, and AC10 Routers

flagged.headline: Tenda AC1900 Router AC15 Model Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Tenda AC1900 Router AC15 Model contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute system commands via the deviceName POST parameter.

flagged.headline: Tenda AC11 Router Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Tenda AC11 devices contain a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in /goform/setmac which allows attackers to execute code via a crafted post request.

flagged.headline: [CRITICAL] Progress Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX and Sitefinity Cryptographic Weakness Vu...

content.excerpt_text: Progress Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX and Sitefinity have a cryptographic weakness in Telerik.Web.UI.dll that can be exploited to disclose encryption keys (Telerik.Web.UI.DialogParametersEncryptionKey and/or the MachineKey), perform cross-site-scripting (XSS) attacks, compromise the ASP.NET ViewState, and/or upload and download files.

flagged.headline: TeamViewer Desktop Bypass Remote Login Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: TeamViewer Desktop allows for bypass of remote-login access control because the same AES key is used for different customers' installations. If an attacker were to know this key, they could decrypt protected information stored in registry or configuration files or decryption of the Unattended Access password to the system (which allows for remote login to the system).

flagged.headline: Symantec Messaging Gateway Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Symantec Messaging Gateway contains an unspecified vulnerability which can allow for remote code execution. With the ability to perform remote code execution, an attacker may also desire to perform privilege escalating actions.

flagged.headline: Sumavision EMR Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Sumavision Enhanced Multimedia Router (EMR) contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability allowing the creation of users with elevated privileges as administrator on a device.

flagged.headline: Sophos SFOS SQL Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Sophos Firewall operating system (SFOS) firmware contains a SQL injection vulnerability when configured with either the administration (HTTPS) service or the User Portal is exposed on the WAN zone. Successful exploitation may cause remote code execution to exfiltrate usernames and hashed passwords for the local device admin(s), portal admins, and user accounts used for remote access (but not external Active Directory or LDAP passwords).

flagged.headline: SonicWall SSLVPN SMA100 SQL Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SonicWall SSLVPN SMA100 contains a SQL injection vulnerability that allows remote exploitation for credential access by an unauthenticated attacker.

flagged.headline: SonicWall Email Security Path Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SonicWall Email Security contains a path traversal vulnerability that allows a post-authenticated attacker to read files on the remote host. This vulnerability has known usage in a SonicWall Email Security exploit chain along with CVE-2021-20021 and CVE-2021-20022 to achieve privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: SonicWall Email Security Unrestricted Upload of File Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SonicWall Email Security contains an unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability that allows a post-authenticated attacker to upload a file to the remote host. This vulnerability has known usage in a SonicWall Email Security exploit chain along with CVE-2021-20021 and CVE-2021-20023 to achieve privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: SonicWall SMA100 SQL Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SonicWall SMA100 contains a SQL injection vulnerability allowing an unauthenticated user to gain read-only access to unauthorized resources.

flagged.headline: SonicWall Email Security Improper Privilege Management Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SonicWall Email Security contains an improper privilege management vulnerability that allows an attacker to create an administrative account by sending a crafted HTTP request to the remote host. This vulnerability has known usage in a SonicWall Email Security exploit chain along with CVE-2021-20022 and CVE-2021-20023 to achieve privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: Sonatype Nexus Repository Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Sonatype Nexus Repository contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: SolarWinds Virtualization Manager Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SolarWinds Virtualization Manager allows for privilege escalation through leveraging a misconfiguration of sudo.

flagged.headline: SolarWinds Serv-U Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SolarWinds Serv-U contains an unspecified memory escape vulnerability which can allow for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: SolarWinds Orion Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SolarWinds Orion API contains an authentication bypass vulnerability that could allow a remote attacker to execute API commands.

flagged.headline: SIMalliance Toolbox Browser Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SIMalliance Toolbox Browser contains an command injection vulnerability that could allow remote attackers to retrieve location and IMEI information or execute a range of other attacks by modifying the attack message.

flagged.headline: SAP NetWeaver Directory Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java Platforms contains a directory traversal vulnerability via a ..\ (dot dot backslash) in the fileName parameter to CrashFileDownloadServlet. This allows remote attackers to read files.

flagged.headline: SAP Solution Manager Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP Solution Manager User Experience Monitoring contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability which results in complete compromise of all SMDAgents connected to the Solution Manager.

flagged.headline: SAP NetWeaver Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java Platforms contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability allowing unauthenticated access to execute configuration tasks and create administrative users.

flagged.headline: SAP NetWeaver XML External Entity (XXE) Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java Platforms contains an unspecified vulnerability in BC-BMT-BPM-DSK which allows remote, authenticated users to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks.

flagged.headline: SAP NetWeaver Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP NetWeaver Application Server Java Platforms Invoker Servlet does not require authentication, allowing for remote code execution via a HTTP or HTTPS request.

flagged.headline: SAP Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Path Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SAP Customer Relationship Management (CRM) contains a path traversal vulnerability that allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by users.

flagged.headline: SaltStack Salt Shell Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SaltStack Salt allows an unauthenticated user with network access to the Salt API to use shell injections to run code on the Salt API using the SSH client. This vulnerability affects any users running the Salt API.

flagged.headline: SaltStack Salt Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SaltStack Salt contains an authentication bypass vulnerability in the salt-master process ClearFuncs due to improperly validating method calls. The vulnerability allows a remote user to access some methods without authentication, which can be used to retrieve user tokens from the salt master and/or run commands on salt minions. Salt users who follow fundamental internet security guidelines and best practices are not affected by this vulnerability.

flagged.headline: SaltStack Salt Path Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: SaltStack Salt contains a path traversal vulnerability in the salt-master process ClearFuncs which allows directory access to authenticated users. Salt users who follow fundamental internet security guidelines and best practices are not affected by this vulnerability.

flagged.headline: Roundcube Webmail File Disclosure Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Roundcube Webmail contains a file disclosure vulnerability caused by insufficient input validation in conjunction with file-based attachment plugins, which are used by default.

flagged.headline: Realtek AP-Router SDK Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Realtek AP-Router SDK HTTP web server boa contains a buffer overflow vulnerability due to unsafe copies of some overly long parameters submitted in the form that lead to denial-of-service (DoS).

flagged.headline: rConfig OS Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: rConfig lib/ajaxHandlers/ajaxAddTemplate.php contains an OS command injection vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute OS commands via shell metacharacters in the fileName POST parameter.

flagged.headline: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use-After-Free Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Multiple Qualcomm Chipsets contain a use after free vulnerability due to improper handling of memory mapping of multiple processes simultaneously.

flagged.headline: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Detection of Error Condition Without Action Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Multiple Qualcomm chipsets contain a detection of error condition without action vulnerability when improper handling of address deregistration on failure can lead to new GPU address allocation failure.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure and Policy Secure Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure and Policy Secure allows an authenticated attacker from the admin web interface to inject and execute commands.

severity.affected_product: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure and Pulse Policy Secure

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure contains an arbitrary file read vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker with network access via HTTPS to send a specially crafted URI.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Command Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure contains a command injection vulnerability that allows remote authenticated users to perform remote code execution via Windows File Resource Profiles.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Pulse Connect Secure contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an authenticated attacker to perform code execution using uncontrolled gzip extraction.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Collaboration Suite Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Collaboration Suite contains a buffer overflow vulnerabilities that allows a remote authenticated users to execute code as the root user via maliciously crafted meeting room.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Unrestricted File Upload Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure contains an unrestricted file upload vulnerability that allows an authenticated administrator to perform a file write via a maliciously crafted archive upload in the administrator web interface.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure contains an unspecified vulnerability in the admin web interface that could allow an authenticated attacker to upload a custom template to perform code execution.

flagged.headline: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure Use-After-Free Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti Pulse Connect Secure contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute code via license services.

flagged.headline: Progress Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Progress Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability through RadAsyncUpload which leads to code execution on the server in the context of the w3wp.exe process.

severity.affected_product: Progress Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX

flagged.headline: PlaySMS Server-Side Template Injection Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: PlaySMS contains a server-side template injection vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Oracle WebLogic Server Unspecified Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle WebLogic Server contains an unspecified vulnerability in the Console component with high impacts to confidentilaity, integrity, and availability.

flagged.headline: Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle WebLogic Server contains an unspecified vulnerability, which is assessed to allow for remote code execution, based on this vulnerability being related to CVE-2020-14750.

flagged.headline: Oracle WebLogic Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle WebLogic Server contains an unspecified vulnerability allowing an unauthenticated attacker to perform remote code execution. This vulnerability is related to CVE-2020-14882.

flagged.headline: Oracle WebLogic Server Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle WebLogic Server contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability within Apache Commons, which can allow for for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Oracle Solaris and Zettabyte File System (ZFS) Unspecified Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle Solaris and Oracle ZFS Storage Appliance Kit contain an unspecified vulnerability causing high impacts to confidentiality, integrity, and availability of affected systems.

severity.affected_product: Oracle Solaris and Zettabyte File System (ZFS)

flagged.headline: Oracle Fusion Middleware Unspecified Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Oracle Fusion Middleware Reports Developer contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality and integrity of affected systems.

flagged.headline: Oracle Multiple Products Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Multiple Oracle products contain a remote code execution vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access via T3 or HTTP to takeover the affected system. Impacted Oracle products: Oracle Coherence in Fusion Middleware, Oracle Utilities Framework, Oracle Retail Assortment Planning, Oracle Commerce, Oracle Communications Diameter Signaling Router (DSR).

flagged.headline: Netis WF2419 Devices Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Netis WF2419 devices contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an attacker to perform remote code execution as root through the router's web management page.

flagged.headline: Netgear JGS516PE Devices Missing Function Level Access Control Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Netgear JGS516PE devices contain a missing function level access control vulnerability.

flagged.headline: Nagios XI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Nagios XI contains a remote code execution vulnerability in which a user can modify the check_plugin executable and insert malicious commands to execute as root.

flagged.headline: Mozilla Firefox And Thunderbird Type Confusion Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird contain a type confusion vulnerability due to incorrect alias information in the IonMonkey JIT compiler when setting array elements.

flagged.headline: Mozilla Firefox And Thunderbird Use-After-Free Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird contain a race condition vulnerability when handling a ReadableStream under certain conditions. The race condition creates a use-after-free vulnerability, causing unspecified impacts.

flagged.headline: Mozilla Firefox And Thunderbird Use-After-Free Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird contain a race condition vulnerability when running the nsDocShell destructor under certain conditions. The race condition creates a use-after-free vulnerability, causing unspecified impacts.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Open Management Infrastructure (OMI) Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Open Management Infrastructure (OMI) within Azure VM Management Extensions contains an unspecified vulnerability allowing privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) Driver Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Error Reporting (WER) Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Error Reporting (WER) contains a privilege escalation vulnerability due to the way it handles files, allowing for code execution in kernel mode.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office OLE DLL Side Loading Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office Object Linking & Embedding (OLE) dynamic link library (DLL) contains a side loading vulnerability due to it improperly validating input before loading libraries. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Privilege Common Log File System (CLFS) Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver improperly handles objects in memory which can allow for privilege escalation.

flagged.headline: Microsoft .NET Framework, SharePoint, and Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft .NET Framework, Microsoft SharePoint, and Visual Studio contain a remote code execution vulnerability when the software fails to check the source markup of XML file input. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute code in the context of the process responsible for deserialization of the XML content.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution. This vulnerability is part of the ProxyLogon exploit chain.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Win32k Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Win32k contains a privilege escalation vulnerability due to the component failing to properly handle objects in memory. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to run code in kernel mode.

flagged.headline: Microsoft .NET Framework Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft .NET Framework contains an improper input validation vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft SharePoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft SharePoint fails to check the source markup of an application package. An attacker who successfully exploits the vulnerability could run remote code in the context of the SharePoint application pool and the SharePoint server farm account.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows CryptoAPI Spoofing Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows CryptoAPI (Crypt32.dll) contains a spoofing vulnerability in the way it validates Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) certificates. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by using a spoofed code-signing certificate to sign a malicious executable, making it appear the file was from a trusted, legitimate source. A successful exploit could also allow the attacker to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks and decrypt confidential information on user connections to the affected...

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Scripting Engine contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for memory corruption.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Win32k Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Win32k contains a privilege escalation vulnerability when the Windows kernel-mode driver fails to properly handle objects in memory. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute code in kernel mode.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution. This vulnerability is part of the ProxyLogon exploit chain.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution. This vulnerability is part of the ProxyLogon exploit chain.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution. This vulnerability is part of the ProxyLogon exploit chain.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Netlogon Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft's Netlogon Remote Protocol (MS-NRPC) contains a privilege escalation vulnerability when an attacker establishes a vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection to a domain controller. An attacker who successfully exploits the vulnerability could run a specially crafted application on a device on the network. The vulnerability is also known under the moniker of Zerologon.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to how the Scripting Engine handles objects in memory, leading to remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Outlook Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office Outlook contains a security feature bypass vulnerability due to improperly handling objects in memory. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute commands.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability which can allow for remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability which can allow for remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office and WordPad Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office and WordPad contain an unspecified vulnerability due to the way the applications parse specially crafted files. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability in how the scripting engine handles objects in memory. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to the way the Scripting Engine handles objects in memory. Successful exploitation could allow remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office contains a memory corruption vulnerability that allows remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft MSHTML Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft MSHTML engine contains an improper input validation vulnerability that allows for remote code execution vulnerability.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Internet Explorer Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to failure to properly handle rich text format files in memory. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution in the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft MSCOMCTL.OCX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft MSCOMCTL.OCX contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution, allowing an attacker to take complete control of an affected system under the context of the current user.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution in the context of the current user. This vulnerability is known to be chained with CVE-2018-0798.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Office contains a memory corruption vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory. Successful exploitation allows for remote code execution in the context of the current user. This vulnerability is known to be chained with CVE-2018-0802.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows contains an unspecified vulnerability due to the way ws2ifsl.sys (Winsock) handles objects in memory, allowing for privilege escalation. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute code with elevated privileges.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Local Security Authority (LSA) Spoofing Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Local Security Authority (LSA) contains a spoofing vulnerability allowing an unauthenticated attacker to call a method on the LSARPC interface and coerce the domain controller to authenticate against another server using NTLM.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Win32k Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Win32k contains a privilege escalation vulnerability when the Win32k component fails to properly handle objects in memory. Successful exploitation allows an attacker to execute code in kernel mode.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Adobe Font Manager Library Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Adobe Font Manager Library contains an unspecified vulnerability when handling specially crafted multi-master fonts (Adobe Type 1 PostScript format) that allows for remote code execution for all systems except Windows 10. For systems running Windows 10, an attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could execute code in an AppContainer sandbox context with limited privileges and capabilities.

flagged.headline: Microsoft Windows Group Policy Preferences Password Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft Windows Active Directory contains a privilege escalation vulnerability due to the way it distributes passwords that are configured using Group Policy preferences. An authenticated attacker who successfully exploits the vulnerability could decrypt the passwords and use them to elevate privileges on the domain.

flagged.headline: McAfee Total Protection (MTP) Improper Privilege Management Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: McAfee Total Protection (MTP) contains an improper privilege management vulnerability that allows a local user to gain elevated privileges and execute code, bypassing MTP self-defense.

flagged.headline: Liferay Portal Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Liferay Portal contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute code via JSON web services.

flagged.headline: Kaseya Virtual System/Server Administrator (VSA) Information Disclosure Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Kaseya Virtual System/Server Administrator (VSA) contains an information disclosure vulnerability allowing an attacker to obtain the sessionId that can be used to execute further attacks against the system.

flagged.headline: Ivanti MobileIron Multiple Products Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Ivanti MobileIron's Core & Connector, Sentry, and Monitor and Reporting Database (RDB) products contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

flagged.headline: ImageMagick Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: ImageMagick contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows attackers to perform server-side request forgery (SSRF) via a crafted image.

flagged.headline: ImageMagick Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: ImageMagick contains an unspecified vulnerability that could allow users to delete files by using ImageMagick's 'ephemeral' pseudo protocol, which deletes files after reading.

flagged.headline: IBM Planning Analytics Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: IBM Planning Analytics is vulnerable to a configuration overwrite that allows an unauthenticated user to login as "admin", and then execute code as root or SYSTEM via TM1 scripting.

flagged.headline: IBM Data Risk Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: IBM Data Risk Manager contains an unspecified vulnerability which could allow a remote, authenticated attacker to execute commands on the system.

flagged.headline: IBM Data Risk Manager Security Bypass Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: IBM Data Risk Manager contains a security bypass vulnerability that could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions when configured with SAML authentication. By sending a specially crafted HTTP request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication process and gain full administrative access to the system.

flagged.headline: IBM Data Risk Manager Directory Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: IBM Data Risk Manager contains a directory traversal vulnerability that could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories and send a specially crafted URL request to download arbitrary files from the system.

This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

flagged.headline: Google Chrome FreeType Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Google Chrome uses FreeType, an open-source software library to render fonts, which contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in the function Load_SBit_Png when processing PNG images embedded into fonts. This vulnerability is part of an exploit chain with CVE-2020-17087 on Windows and CVE-2020-16010 on Android.

flagged.headline: Fortinet FortiOS SSL VPN Path Traversal Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Fortinet FortiOS SSL VPN web portal contains a path traversal vulnerability that may allow an unauthenticated attacker to download FortiOS system files through specially crafted HTTP resource requests.

flagged.headline: Fortinet FortiOS SSL VPN Improper Authentication Vulnerability

content.excerpt_text: Fortinet FortiOS SSL VPN contains an improper authentication vulnerability that may allow a user to login successfully without being prompted for the second factor of authentication (FortiToken) if they change the case in their username.
